content.text: What's my current credit score and how is it calculated?

Your Stellar Credit score is calculated using 5 key metrics: transaction volume (20%), payment punctuality (30%), usage frequency (15%), diversification (20%), and average balance (15%). I can analyze your wallet to show you exactly how each metric contributes to your overall score.
How can I improve my credit score on Stellar?

Great question! Here are proven ways to boost your score: 1) Make transactions consistently (increases frequency), 2) Always complete payments on time (improves punctuality), 3) Use different types of transactions like payments, DEX trades, and DeFi (increases diversification), 4) Maintain a steady balance (shows stability). Focus on the punctuality metric first - it has the highest weight at 30%.
What loan offers are available for my score of 650?

With a score of 650, you qualify for our standard tier loans: up to $1,000 at 2.5% monthly interest for 12 months, or $500 at 2% for 6 months. You're only 50 points away from our premium tier (700+) which offers $2,000 at just 2% monthly. Would you like specific tips to reach that next tier?
Is it safe to connect my Stellar wallet?

Absolutely! Stellar Credit uses Stellar Passkeys for authentication - this means biometric security without exposing your private keys. We only read your transaction history for analysis, never access your funds. Your wallet remains fully under your control. Plus, all analysis happens through official Stellar Horizon APIs.
Why is my score lower than expected?

Let me help you understand! Lower scores usually result from: infrequent transactions (hurts frequency score), recent failed/cancelled transactions (impacts punctuality), using only one type of operation (low diversification), or low account balance. The good news? All of these can be improved! Which area would you like to focus on first?
How does Stellar Credit compare to traditional credit scores?

Stellar Credit is revolutionary because it's: 1) Instant (30 seconds vs 7+ days), 2) Inclusive (no prior banking history needed), 3) Transparent (you can see exactly how your score is calculated), 4) Global (works with any Stellar wallet), 5) Cost-effective (90% cheaper than traditional systems). Traditional scores look at credit history; we analyze your actual blockchain financial behavior.
